listing_details: 2 bed 1 bath apartment. Check-in after 3pm, quiet hours after 10pm, no parties, no smoking, street parking only, keypad entry.

conversations.guest_message: Hey! Weâ€™re thinking of staying this weekend. Could we check in at noon and have a few friends over for drinks and music?
conversations.reply:
Hi there!

Thanks for reaching out!

Regarding check-in, it's set for after 3 PM. We unfortunately can't accommodate a noon check-in this weekend.

Also, just a heads up that we have a strict no parties policy, so having friends over for drinks and music wouldn't be possible.

Let us know if you have any other questions!
